mean_cn: n.废弃，取消，（美）州对联邦法令的拒绝执行或承认
mean_en: the act of nullifying; making null and void; counteracting or overriding the effect or force of something
sentence: The nullification of the slave system has great progressive significance.
sentence_trans: 奴隶制的废除具有极大的进步意义。
word_etyma: null没有 ＋ ification表名词 → nullification无效；废弃（美）州对联邦法令的拒绝执行或承认
